name: Bing feng: Yong heng zhi men
description: Bing feng: Yong heng zhi men is a movie starring Donnie Yen, Baoqiang Wang, and Shengyi Huang. The imperial guard and his three traitorous childhood friends ordered to hunt him down get accidentally buried and kept frozen in time....
keywords: police officer,police officer killed,police officer shot,police officer shot in the chest,police officer stabbed
